name: Project Castlevania Z
storyline: In July 1999, Dracula has been resurrected, and is more powerful than ever. Jay Morris must travel around Europe to find the last descendant of the Belmont clan and give them the Vampire Killer so they can defeat Dracula once and for all. Will he accomplish this mission before the eclipse?
summary: A Castlevania fan game mainly inspired by Rondo of Blood.
